id.description: Unique task identifier used to check status of the task and retrieve the results once the task is ready.

status.description:
Task status:
 * `completed` – Mockup Generator task was successfully processed
 * `pending` – Mockup Generator task is still being processed
 * `failed` – Mockup Generator task failed

catalog_variant_mockups.description: A list of mockups grouped by variant. Note that the same list of mockups can appear under multiple variants, this happens in cases where the variants have the same mockups, for example if the only difference is the size of the variant.

catalog_variant_id.description: ID of a catalog variant for which the mockup was generated.

self.description: Link to the Generator Task details
self.title: HateoasLink
